text: Laura Holly Aikman (born 24 December 1985) is an English actress. She is known for portraying the roles of Mysti in the CBBC-BBC Two children's fantasy series The Mysti Show (2004–2005), May Phelps in the BBC One medical drama series Casualty (2009–2010), Rosie in the ITV2 mock reality show Lemon La Vida Loca (2012–2013), Melanie Poppy in the CBBC comedy drama and musical children's series 4 O'Clock Club (2012–2014), Natalie Mason in the ITV2 sitcom The Job Lot (2014–2015), Lorna Hutchinson in the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2015), and Sonia in the hugely popular BBC One sitcom Gavin & Stacey (2019). ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
title: Laura Aikman
